function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cancellation and postponement of scientific conferences","Impact":"Reduced dissemination of research, decreased networking and collaboration opportunities","Mitigation":"Encourage online conferences, develop virtual networking and collaboration platforms","Technologies":"Virtual conferencing platforms, online collaboration tools","People":"Scientists, researchers, conference attendees","Owner":"Conference organizers, scientific institutions"},{"Description":"Disruption in the supply chain","Impact":"Reduced production, consumption, and demand for goods and services","Mitigation":"Implement resilient supply chain practices, diversify sourcing and manufacturing locations","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, predictive analytics for demand planning","People":"Businesses, manufacturers, consumers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Impact on financial markets and global economy","Impact":"Market instability, decreased stock performance, low bond yields","Mitigation":"Implement financial stimulus packages, diversify investment portfolios","Technologies":"Financial modeling and forecasting, economic stimulus tools","People":"Investors, businesses, governments","Owner":"Financial institutions, government agencies"}]}
